briefTitle: Adrenal and Gonadal Hormone Replacement in Anorexia Nervosa

interventions.name: Hormone replacement therapy (estrogen/progestin)
otherNames: Alesse (20 mg ethinyl estradiol + 0.1 mg levonorgestrel)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age 15 - 30 years
* Anorexia nervosa by psychiatric criteria
* Amenorrhea for at least 3 months

Exclusion Criteria:

* Receiving no medications known to affects bone metabolism
* No other chronic medical conditions
